title: Be The Master Of Your Budget
description: For many, creating a budget is a dreaded task. But you can do it. These tools will help — and maybe even make it fun.

itunes:title: Be The Master Of Your Budget
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: For many, it's a dreaded task: making a budget to keep track of money. Guess what? You can do it, and we show you some tools that can help — maybe even make it fun.
itunes:subtitle: For many, it's a dreaded task: making a budget to keep track of money. Guess what? You can do it, and we show you some tools that can help — maybe even make it fun.
content:encoded: For many, creating a budget is a dreaded task. But you can do it. These tools will help — and maybe even make it fun.
